Package adaa.analytics.rules.logic.quality

Class ClassificationMeasure

java.lang.Object
adaa.analytics.rules.logic.quality.ClassificationMeasure
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQualityMeasure, Serializable
public class ClassificationMeasure extends Object implements IQualityMeasure, Serializable
Class gathering all quality measures for classification problems.
